thread.title: Watch: The new Harry Potter iBooks are like living in Hogwarts
thread.title_full: Life | Watch: The new Harry Potter iBooks are like living in Hogwarts - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Watch: The new Harry Potter iBooks are like living in Hogwarts
text:
We're huge fans of Harry Potter. Let's just get that out of the way.
So when we heard they were making an enhanced iBook version which included animations and artwork blended into them, it's safe to say we got a little excited.
Well those enhanced versions are out, and they look amazing, so much so that we might have to pick up some kind of Apple product to read them on, seeing as that's the only way to get your hands(eyes) on them.
They're available from today, and they'll set you back whatever the equivalent of $9.99 is, which ain't too bad if you ask us, but we know you're not here to question us on our thoughts about eBook pricing strategies, so here's a video and some GIFs of the books.
Via Mashable
